duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform daily branch and customer service duties, providing customers with efficient and accurate transaction processing.
Promote business by providing quality customer service and handling routine customer inquiries.
Provide customer referrals for products and services on a daily basis.
Balance assigned cash daily and maintain strict adherence to security procedures and sole control of cash drawer and assigned cash limits.
Identify customers, obtain proper identification, and verify endorsements/payees, cash, and checks/withdrawals/transfers.
Contribute to the responsibility in meeting monthly branch and/or individual scorecard goals on a consistent basis.
Ensure delivery of excellent customer service throughout the Bank by adhering to sales and @ your service standards.
Order, receive, verify, and distribute cash in accordance with bank policy.
Promote and maintain positive relationships with all internal and external customers.
Contribute to the fulfillment of the Bank’s objectives and goals by performing as a team member in allocating and coordinating the workflow.
Keep current and be knowledgeable in order to communicate the Bank’s products and services to clients.
Ability to open and/or close the Branch and may require working hours outside normal scheduled hours.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; Successful completion of the Bank’s in-house Sales Associate Training Program.
